definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Pressor response was induced by electrical stimulation of the hypothalamic defence area.
sentences.chinese: 電刺激下丘腦“防禦反應區”誘發升壓反應。

sentences.english: The hypothalamus controls hormone secretions from the nearby pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 下丘腦控制附近腦下垂體分泌激素。

sentences.english: Only drink cold to stimulate the gastrointestinal tract, make the hypothalamus produces hunger.
sentences.chinese: 只能喝涼開水去刺激胃腸道，使得下丘腦產生飢餓感。

sentences.english: Part of multi-angle cells labeled at the bottom of the epithalamic tetra-brain ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 下丘腦的四腦室底部標記到部分多角細胞。

sentences.english: A gliosis layer between the wall of tumor and the hypothalamus was seen.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤與下丘腦間有膠質增生層。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the microsurgical techniques for chiasmatic-hypothalamic glioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高視交叉下丘腦膠質瘤顯微手術治療水平。

sentences.english: The model of hypothalamic slices of rat in vitro was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了大鼠下丘腦腦片培養實驗模型。

sentences.english: The anterior hypothalamus provides thermoregulation when the body is too hot.
sentences.chinese: 當人體過熱時，下丘腦前部可提供溫度調節作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the better way of avoidance of hypothalamus injury in surgical management of craniopharyngioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱咽管瘤手術中避免下丘腦損傷的的方法。

sentences.english: Experimentally blocking GABA to the posterior hypothalamus engenders the same response.
sentences.chinese: 對後下丘腦阻斷GABA的實驗也出現了同樣的反應。

sentences.english: The fatterthey get, and the more leptin they make, the more impervious thehypothalamus becomes.
sentences.chinese: 他們越胖，產生的瘦素越多，下丘腦也就越不爲所動。

sentences.english: A method of ventral approach to hypothalamus for recording unit activity was described.
sentences.chinese: 本文描述了經貓腦腹面記錄下丘腦單位活動的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical treatment for hypothalamic hamartoma causing epilepsy in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童下丘腦錯構瘤導致癲癇的手術治療。
